## Description {#details}

A string table that doesn&#39;t need relocations.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> this class when a string table doesn&#39;t need relocations. This class provides this ability by just associating offsets with strings.

Definition at line 23 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h">NonRelocatableStringpool.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Typedefs

### MapTy {#a66112d610babd2a7ef56b84e4daa4b87}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::NonRelocatableStringpool::MapTy =  StringMap&lt;DwarfStringPoolEntry, BumpPtrAllocator&gt;</>}>
Entries are stored into the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringmap">StringMap</a> and simply linked together through the second element of this pair in order to keep track of insertion order.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h">NonRelocatableStringpool.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getEntriesForEmission() {#a648f04a20283c7dd28b9fad17ba85fac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt; DwarfStringPoolEntryRef &gt; llvm::NonRelocatableStringpool::getEntriesForEmission () const</>}>
Return the list of strings to be emitted.

This does not contain the strings which were added via internString only.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h">NonRelocatableStringpool.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-cpp/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-cpp">NonRelocatableStringpool.cpp</a>.

### getStringOffset() {#adcdd0ccc4040ffdb46a684d771cacf8f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::NonRelocatableStringpool::getStringOffset (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> S)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the offset of string <code>S</code> in the string table.

This can insert a new element or return the offset of a pre-existing one.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h">NonRelocatableStringpool.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### internString() {#a6efe11e41ed3e37c95dc444f11580605}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>StringRef llvm::NonRelocatableStringpool::internString (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> S)</>}>
Get permanent storage for <code>S</code> (but do not necessarily emit <code>S</code> in the output section).

A latter call to <a href="#adcdd0ccc4040ffdb46a684d771cacf8f">getStringOffset()</a> with the same string will chain it though.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> that points to permanent storage to use in place of <code>S</code>.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h">NonRelocatableStringpool.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-cpp/#l00026">26</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-cpp">NonRelocatableStringpool.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
